plot outline: Rekha Das struggles to strike a balance between her family life and her profession as a theatre artiste. Her husband, is a drunkard who harasses her for money to buy liquor. In another track, Ramesh Bhat teaches acting to some village folks for a TV show. There is subtle humour with the would-be artistes struggling to pronounce Kannada properly.
title: Ee Banna Lokadali
plot: Rekha Das struggles to strike a balance between her family life and her profession as a theatre artiste. Her husband, is a drunkard who harasses her for money to buy liquor. In another track, Ramesh Bhat teaches acting to some village folks for a TV show. There is subtle humour with the would-be artistes struggling to pronounce Kannada properly.
